div.ab: these drugs melt in a new earthen pot, & when it is melted, you will pass it in a clean cloth & you will see a beautiful varnish.

div.head: Another varnish
div.ab: Take one ounce of spike lavender oil & heat it over coals, & then take a half ounce of sang dea Raiec & grind it coarsely, and then put it into the spike lavender oil, & then mix it with a stick until you see that it is melted, and then put it in a glass vial. And when you want to use it, heat it little by little over the coals. And before laying it, lay a coat of glue very clear, & then lay it with a pinceau.

div.head: For making red varnish
div.ab: Take vermillion & soak it with gum water as well as with other water, and make it like the other varnish, & mix this other water like the other varnish, and then lay it down as before to make three green.

div.head: To make green wood
div.ab: Take very strong vinegar, salt, and rainwater, and mix it together with verdigris, and put it with your wood in a new earthenware vessel, and lay it in some very warm horse dung for eight or nine days.
